name: Windows XP Tablet PC Snipping Tool Image
summary: A SNIP file is an image created by Windows XP Tablet PC Edition's Snipping Tool. It contains a screenshot of some or all of a user's Windows screen. Only the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition's Snipping Tool creates SNIP files; other versions of Snipping Tool do not create SNIP files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Windows XP Tablet PC Edition Snipping Tool
